jobs.title: Technical Architect
jobs.details: Making sure that Clients and the Creative Team have an intricate understanding of what the deliverables should be.

jobs.title: Jr. Web Developer
jobs.details: Building custom applications for the web. Assisting the Senior Developer on projects and supporting the Creative Team by bringing designs into fruition via code.

jobs.title: Sr. Web Developer
jobs.details: Has a wealth of experience and understanding of the applications we build for the web. Leads developmenmt on most large scale projects. Mentor to Junior Developers.

jobs.title: Engagement Manager
jobs.details: Bridges the gap between the Creative Team and the Client. Protects the Creatives from fierce requests and communictates details in a way everyone can understand. Translates the work of developers into plain English for clients.
